alert.note: Alert for Cass; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 2:15PM CST until November 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FIRST ACCUMULATING SNOW OF THE SEASON FOR MUCH OF CENTRAL ILLINOIS... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois, generally from I-55 west. * WHEN...The advisory is in effect from midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday. The greatest impacts will be between 3 am and 9 am. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates are expected to average around a quarter inch per hour, but may be as high as a half inch per hour before sunrise.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Cass; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler; Scott
